reviewText:
"Halloween is a fun type of scary," says Instructor Ann Felice in this holiday-themed edition of Let's Create. Featuring a spooky soundtrack and filled with fun facts about Halloween, this video entertains kids while teaching them all kinds of imaginative tricks and treats. Some of the art projects featured include:
--flying tissue-paper ghosts
--scary skeletons made from straws
--pumpkin windsocks created using paint and paper bags
--fun noisemakers, using paper plates and pebbles, rice or dried macaroni
--and a lot more!
